title: Mars Transit in the 8th House for Capricorn Ascendant
summary: When Mars transits the 8th house for Capricorn Ascendant, energy turns intense, inward, and transformative. You may feel driven to confront hidden issues, power dynamics, and deep emotional or financial entanglements. Sudden reactions, anger, or impatience can surface, especially around shared resources, control, or trust. This phase supports research, crisis handling, and decisive transformation when discipline guides action. Stability comes by managing impulses and using courage to face change calmly, turning pressure into inner strength and strategic resilience.

sections.title: Core Personality
points: Strong urge to confront hidden matters

sections.title: Finance
points: Focus on shared finances and liabilities
Risk in speculative or secret dealings

sections.title: Mental / Inner
points: Anger triggered by loss of control

closing: This Mars transit forces Capricorn Ascendants to face transformation directly. Controlled intensity turns pressure into lasting power.
